channel.title: Profit from Herblore?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how i can make complete profite with herblore? If so please show me your math i would like to see it. ;)
Mystats: Herblore: 42 Farming: 49

They’re 6.3k to about 7.2k I believe (Last time I checked).

item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

ranarrs are around 5k-6k now and ppots are not 20k, I think they are 4k-7k something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Profit from Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Back in the day when rs wasn’t completely shit, what you could do was buy 600k’s worth of rannars, make ppots and sell for a small profit, I recall making at least double what I started with in about 2 days.

The problem was, rannars were around 2k, and ppots not much more than 3.5k, and last time I checked they were reaching 20k.

Read full topic

item.title: Profit from Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @Zigon Zigon
item.description:
@Zigon wrote:

I used to tele around farming rannars, then sell the pots.

Read full topic

item.title: Profit from Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Lol making a profit from herblore is easy.
First off kill either flesh crawlers or chaos droids and collect there drops(herbs)
Then kill something or find a spawn point for the other item for he potion

So after the whole process, you will make a profit aslong as you do not buy the herb your self.

Also pickpocket master farmers and get ranarr’s. A ranarr seed is about 20k-21k. Then plant it and you should get around 6-7 herbs. 5k-6k each.

Read full topic

grow ranarr’s and sell pots? I am not sure of the ranarr seed price though.

@zammyking111 wrote:

ya heres what i usually do i farm ranarr’s then i go and do barrows for a little while then i go back and farm the ranarrs and get ranarr weeds then make em into p potions.

item.title: Profit from Herblore?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

There can be alot of money in farming and herblore except it needs very high levels and lots of time, i remember seeing some guide that i think it was the top farmer highscores posted. He used up ALL the farming spots on rs and went through them all in a cycle so it wasn’t as boring as just standing around one patch etc.

Read full topic
